results.definition: the contestant you hope to defeat
examples: he had respect for his rivals
he wanted to know what the competition was doing

results.definition: be equal to in quality or ability
examples: Nothing can rival cotton for durability
Your performance doesn't even touch that of your colleagues
Her persistence and ambition only matches that of her parents

results.definition: be the rival of, be in competition with
examples: we are rivaling for first place in the race
